name: Skeledungeon (Dylan McQuitty)
description:
Skeledungeon is an endless roguelike project combining the combat from ARPGs like Diablo, with the randomised item system from Risk of Rain.

The project is not 100% completed. It has no audio and no animations.

Attributions:

  • Icons made by Lorc, Carl Olsen, sbed, Skoll, Delapouite. Available on https://game-icons.net
  • Character models made by Kay Lousberg. Avaliable on https://kaylousberg.itch.io/kaykit-dungeon
